titles.title: I Love Him Because He First Loved Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ Jesus my Lord from heaven came, To save me from guilt and sin and shame; His death on the cross of Calvary Brought pardon and gave me liberty.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I love Him because He first loved me, He first loved me, He first loved me; I love Him because He first loved me, And died on the cross of Calvary.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He sweat drops of blood in prayer for me, Heartbroken in dark Gethsemane., While angels from blessèd realms of light Gave strength to His aching heart that night.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Up Calvary’s hill the cross He bore, And for me a crown of thorns He wore; They nailed Him upon the tree to die, Then darkness came over earth and sky.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My Lord who was slain by sinful man, A wonderful Friend to me has been; He rose from the tomb with victory, And now I love Him who first loved me.
